casebody.data:
David ROYCE, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Susan LAPORTE, Defendant-Appellant. David Royce, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Susan Laporte, Defendant-Appellant,
and
Marcia C. Ross, Appellee. SC: 158726, 158727
COA: 337549
340354
SC: 158728
COA: 339903 Supreme Court of Michigan. February 4, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 9, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
